emotions.gift: The GIFT of HURT: Healing through relationship and Courage to risk
emotions.summary: Hurt lets us know that we have pain. It’s the thread that runs through all feelings. It’s an opportunity to admit, accept, and surrender to the truth of our neediness. Hurt points to our need for help from those who have genuine regard and love for us. All healing comes thru relationship.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of LONLINESS: Speaks to our deep hunger to belong, be known, and loved. Causes us to seek intimacy
emotions.summary: Loneliness speaks to our deep hunger to belong and be known, received and loved. It’s a gift that causes us to seek out relationship where we can be expectant. We are lonely when we have both a desire to live in hope, and a willingness to hear, “no”.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of SADNESS: Acceptance and serenity about what we can't control
emotions.summary: Sadness speaks to how much we VALUE what is missed, what’s gone, what’s lost. It also speaks of how much we value what we love, what we have and what we live. The more we live an open hearted life of fullness, the more we lose! Sadness gives us the gift of valuing and honoring life.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of ANGER: Passion that moves us to express the substance and commitments of our heart
emotions.summary: ANGER MOVES US TO ACTION. It shows our yearning and hunger for life. It exposes the substance, desires and commitments of our hearts. Angry people can be known because of their unwillingness to hide. It’s the first step to authentic living. It’s a caring feeling saying something matters.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of FEAR: Wisdom, Faith & Discerment come from seeking truth instead of safety
emotions.summary: FEAR MAKES US AWARE OF OUR CHOICES. Fear brings us STRENGTH. It allows us to experience RISK (or run from it). Risk your heart with your need. TRUST others for assistance (or not). DEPEND on others for their skill and willingness. COLLABORATE with others for mutual gain (or become fretful and controlling). We can gain wisdom through the deeply experienced awareness of spiritual truth that starts with listening to fear.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of SHAME: Humility - Recognition of our potential to fail and do harm, to succeed and to love
emotions.summary: SHAME is a consciousness of our limitations and giftedness that allows empathy for others. It allows us to stop comparison and competition in order to prove our worth, and start giving ourselves to something greater - the service of others - In humility we are grateful and merciful.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of GUILT: Freedom & Forgiveness - Desire and vulnerability for change
emotions.summary: GUILT prompts us to seek the forgiveness that sets us free. Through guilt the heart confronts behavior and behavior reveals the state of our hearts. Guilt is our most precious gift because the relinquishing of the heart to another has transforming power. Love comes through truth not merit.

emotions.gift: The GIFT of GLADNESS: Joy with sadness that comes to those who hope

tasks.task: Value openly by having deep sadness
Write poems and songs
Send letters to my children at their milestones
Hug my friends and say I love you
Visit an old friend I've been meaning to see
Get up early and hear God whisper in the sunrise
Grieve a dream that hasn't come to pass
Forsake manipulating others
Do courageous acts
Speak truth with love and respect
Affirm the capabilities of others
Declare my intentions
Make promises and commitments
Hug my children & hold their hand in the dark
Kiss my Father
Tell my mother of the hurt
Tell God I need more
Tell my spouse I was wrong
Admit my lack of sufficiency and inability to control circumstances
Declare my hunger for love
Reach out for love and give it away
